onewordGame.yourTurnText: It's your turn to guess! Waiting for clues...
onewordGame.similarclueText: This clue is too similar to the word
onewordGame.realwordText: Are you sure this is a real word?
onewordGame.spectatingText: You are currently spectating this game!

onewordGameEnd.wrapUpText: While you're here, check out two of our new games
onewordGameEnd.textForSupporters: {'Hope you had fun, '}{name}{'! This is all made possible by supporters like you üòç'}
onewordGameEnd.textForSellingSupporter: If you enjoyed One Word, consider becoming a supporter!
onewordGameEnd.textForSupporterPrivilege: You can earn nice perks like private rooms, while helping cover our server costs.
onewordGameEnd.continuePlaying: (Not done playing? Alright, click here to continue.)
onewordGameEnd.message0: You do understand this is supposed to be a COOPERATIVE game, right?
onewordGameEnd.message1: At least you can't do much worse next time!
onewordGameEnd.message3: Here's a tip: try not colliding so much.
onewordGameEnd.message4: Well, it's not the worst result I've ever seen...
onewordGameEnd.message5: Alright, now that you've warmed up, are you ready to play for real?
onewordGameEnd.message6: Respectable attempt. Want to try again?
onewordGameEnd.message7: Okay... At least it's a lucky number?
onewordGameEnd.message8: Not bad! Now we're getting somewhere.
onewordGameEnd.message9: Pretty good job -- but can you make it to double digits?
onewordGameEnd.message10: Huh, color me impressed. Was it a fluke?
onewordGameEnd.message11: You really dialed it to the next level. Try a harder category next time!
onewordGameEnd.message12: You all must be cheating somehow, I just know it...
onewordGameEnd.message13: Wow, that's hall of fame material right there. I am in awe.
